attributes.action: Suspend the local Conservative party in Beaconsfield over Dominic Grieve case
attributes.additional_details:
The no confidence motion was passed at the association's annual general meeting on Friday evening.
 "Our members had a robust discussion Dominic Grieve on Brexit before voting on a motion of confidence which, I can confirm with a heavy heart that he failed to retain.”

More evidence that the uncompromising dogmatic right is running the @Conservatives #DominicGrieve is one of the finest, most courageous Parliamentarians ever - who has always put his country first & championed all his constituents
attributes.background:
Prominent Conservative Remainer Dominic Grieve is facing deselection after suffering a vote of no confidence by his local party.

The former attorney general was one of the MPs behind the cross-party move to seize control of House of Commons business to stage a series of indicative votes recently

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of the Conservative party, not the UK Government or Parliament.
